product_name: All Terrain Lip Armor Lip Balm - SPF 28
long_description: The All Terrain Lip Armor SPF 28 Lip Balm protects your lips from sun and wind with a moisturizing formula and cool mint flavor. SPF 28 UVA/UVB protection helps prevent sunburn. Blend of jojoba oil, beeswax, cocoa butter, vitamin E and other ingredients soothe chapped lips.
short_description: The All Terrain Lip Armor SPF 28 Lip Balm protects your lips from sun and wind with a moisturizing formula and cool mint flavor.
